script:
#!/bin/bash
#SBATCH --job-name=deepseek_test          # Job name
#SBATCH --output=dp%j.out                 # Standard output file
#SBATCH --error=dp%j.err                  # Error file
#SBATCH --partition=ice-gpu               # GPU partition
#SBATCH -N1 --gres=gpu:1                  # 1 GPU on 1 node
#SBATCH --cpus-per-task=4                 # 4 CPU cores
#SBATCH --mem=32G                         # 16 GB RAM
#SBATCH --time=01:00:00                   # Max runtime (h:mm:ss)
#SBATCH --mail-type=END,FAIL              # Email notifications
#SBATCH --mail-user=ychauhan9@gatech.edu  # Your email

# ── Load environment ───────────────────────────────────────────
module load anaconda3                    # Adjust if different on ICE
source activate my_env                   # Your Conda env

export HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN=$(cat /home/hice1/ychauhan9/scratch/hgtoken.env)

# ── Run DeepSeek job ───────────────────────────────────────────
python deepseek_test.py
